entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
